00032 class Plugin {
00033 
00034     private $oParent; // reference instance to object being decorated with this plugin
00035     private $oBuffer;
00036     private $sBasePath;
00037 
00042     public function __construct() {
00043         $this->oBuffer = Buffer::getInstance();
00044     }
00045 
00053     public final function initialize($oParent = null, $sBasePath = '') {
00054         $this->oParent = $oParent;
00055         $this->sBasePath = $sBasePath;
00056     }
00057 
00065     protected function setVar($vName, $sValue = null) {
00066         $this->oBuffer->set($vName, $sValue);
00067     }
00068 
00074     protected function getVar($sName) {
00075         return (string) $this->oBuffer->get($sName);
00076     }
00077 
00088     public final function getRequestResponse($oRequestResponse) {
00089         if (!is_null($this->oParent)) {
00090             $oRequestResponse = $this->oParent->getRequestResponse($oRequestResponse);
00091         }
00092         $sCurPath = getcwd();
00093         chdir($this->sBasePath);
00094         $oRequestResponse = $this->run($oRequestResponse);
00095         chdir($sCurPath);
00096         return $oRequestResponse;
00097     }
